member.name: DXGI_INFO_QUEUE_FILTER
member.summary: Describes a debug message filter, which contains lists of message types to allow and deny.

member.name: DXGI_INFO_QUEUE_FILTER.AllowList
member.summary: A structure that describes the types of messages to allow.

member.name: DXGI_INFO_QUEUE_FILTER.DenyList
member.summary: A structure that describes the types of messages to deny.
